answers.answer: I would contact your dr. That sounds like pre-eclampsia to me. It can be a serious condition if not monitored properly. How has your blood pressure been?

It's been a little bit higher than normal but not enough that my dr was worried. I think my mom had preeclampsia but I am not sure. She told me with her first she had seizures at birth and had to have a c-section. I can't remember what she said it was though. I will have to ask her.

question: My feet started swelling a couple of weeks ago. If I stand up for any time at all they swell and turn purple. I know it's normal for your feet to swell but it seems so early. I have also had trouble with my hands and face being swollen when I wake up. Is this normal or should I be worried?
title: Swelling feet
